info.description:
# This Is A Telegram Bot Written In Python For Mirroring Files On The Internet To Our Beloved Google Drive.

Here Are Some Things To Get You Started.ðŸ‘‡ ## ðŸ‘‰[All The Feature Of This Bot Or What This Bot Can Do For You.](https://github.com/iamLiquidX/MirrorX/wiki/Feature-Or-What-This-Bot-Can-Do) ## ðŸ‘‰[How To Deploy](https://github.com/iamLiquidX/MirrorX/wiki/How-To-Deploy) ## ðŸ‘‰[Commands To Use The Bot](https://github.com/iamLiquidX/MirrorX/wiki/Commands-To-Use-This-Bot) ## ðŸ‘‰[Modification Guide](https://github.com/iamLiquidX/MirrorX/wiki/Modification) For The Most Recent Changes, Please Check The Changelog.ðŸ‘‡ ## ðŸ‘‰[Changelog](https://github.com/iamLiquidX/MirrorX/wiki/Changelog) # Credits ðŸ‘‡ 1. [Shivam Jha aka lzzy12](https://github.com/lzzy12) & [JaskaranSM aka Zero Cool](https://github.com/jaskaranSM) - They Built This Bot From Scratch. 2. [Sreeraj V R](https://github.com/SVR666)- Added Inline Button, Added Support For Deleting File/Folders From GDrive, Search Results On Telegra.ph. 3. [Archie](https://github.com/archie9211) - Added Support For Extraction Of Archives, Fixed SSL Handshake Error, Update Trackers Dynamically. 4. [Magneto](https://github.com/magneto261290) - Added Alot Of Customization, Support For Custom File Names, Support For Password Protected Archives, Quality Selection Option In YTDL And Much More. 5. [KenHV](https://github.com/KenHV) - Many Fixes And Imporovements. 6. [Anos](https://github.com/destiny6520) - Modification/Customization Guide. 7. [Viswanath](https://github.com/nenokkadine) - Fixes & Improvements, Dockerfile Clean Up, DHT Support In Aria. 8. [breakdowns](https://github.com/breakdowns) - Source Code For Count,Zip/Unzip GDrive Links & Fembed.
info.name: MirrorX
